record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - January 29, 2008)

[Page: H522]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members may have 5 legislative days to revise and extend their remarks and include extraneous materials on H.R. 1528.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Arizona?
